Package pds

The thread controller, consisting of the main program loop which launches image processing tasks.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    PDSMain
    Contains the main program loop

Package pds Description

The thread controller, consisting of the main program loop which launches image processing tasks. It uses CountDownLatches to coordinate threads, and keeps the most recent two frames so that it can easily pass them to frame-comparative jobs.
